channel.title: Film Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Film Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Review: Fantastic Four: First Steps is the best film version so far
item.description: The plot makes no sense, but that retro-futuristic Tomorrowland vibe and superb cast make it (mostly) work.

item.title: Review: Stellar cast makes Superman shine bright
item.description: James Gunn’s entertaining reboot has a few flaws but so much heart—and wow, that stellar cast.
